values: The Supremacy and Sweetness of God: Preaching for Radical ObedienceThe Supremacy and Sweetness of God: Preaching for Radical Obedience

Pastors much preach the beauty of holiness to awaken contrition over lack of holiness. Preaching beauty begets contrition which begets radical obedience.
